item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Elon Musk to attend Trump's joint session of Congress
item.description: Elon Musk will be in the chamber Tuesday evening for President Donald Trump's address, ABC News has confirmed.

item.title: Diane Warren says she'll 'be back' after missing out on Oscar for 16th time
item.description: Diane Warren shared her feelings on missing out on the best original song Oscar for the 16th time.

item.title: Pope suffers 2 episodes of respiratory failure, Vatican says
item.description: The pope's clinical condition had on Sunday remained "stable," the church said.

item.title: Vanity Fair Oscar Party 2025: All the looks from the red carpet
item.description: Stars arrived at the 2025 Vanity Fair Oscar Party following the 2025 Oscars Sunday night.

item.title: WATCH: The biggest moments from the 2025 Oscars
item.description: ABC News’ Zohreen Shah and contributor Kelley Carter break down the wins and performances from Hollywood’s biggest night.
